授業目的: The purpose of this course is to help students improve their overall English reading comprehension and skills. The course will aim to assist students in building and practicing using some of the fundamental skills needed to develop and improve overall English reading abilities. Students will be introduced to engaging nonfiction reading passages and a variety of activities to improve reading comprehension, critical thinking, and vocabulary knowledge. Students will learn about and be encouraged to use various reading strategies, including activating prior knowledge, skimming, scanning, making inferences, predicting, and summarizing. There will be an emphasis on improving students’ lexical range. Students will expand their vocabulary knowledge and use through an emphasis on learning and understanding target words and phrases.
到達目標:
Students will improve their oral reading skills, including pronunciation, intonation and stress, chunking, rhythm, and overall reading fluency.
Students will improve overall comprehension of reading passages.
Students will learn about and understand the structure and features of paragraphs and reading passages.
Students will learn about and develop reading strategies to improve overall reading skills and comprehension, including skimming, scanning, making inferences, predicting, and summarizing.
Students will expand their vocabulary knowledge of target words and phrases through a variety of reinforcement activities.
Students will improve their critical thinking skills.
授業方法:
Course format will be face to face.
During class, students will be required to complete work individually and collaboratively. Students will be required to complete homework, outside of class time.
